publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-783 Bob Doris: Paul Leonard-Morgan—That the Parliament applauds the success of Glasgow composer Paul Leonard-Morgan who has successfully won the competition to compose the new anthem for the USA Olympic Team and looks forward to the day when the Scottish team requires one too.

S3M-783 Paul Leonard-Morgan (lodged on 5 November 2007) Alasdair Allan*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Bill Kidd*, Bashir Ahmad*, Brian Adam*, Stuart McMillan*, Rob Gibson*, Ian McKee*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Jamie Hepburn*, Sandra White*
S3M-783 Paul Leonard-Morgan (lodged on 5 November 2007) Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-783 Paul Leonard-Morgan (lodged on 5 November 2007) Gil Paterson*

S3M-783 Bob Doris: Paul Leonard-Morgan—That the Parliament applauds the success of Glasgow composer Paul Leonard-Morgan who has successfully won the competition to compose the new anthem for the USA Olympic Team and looks forward to the day when the Scottish team requires one too. Supported by: Alasdair Allan, Joe FitzPatrick, Bill Kidd, Bashir Ahmad, Brian Adam, Stuart McMillan, Rob Gibson, Ian McKee, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Jamie Hepburn, Sandra White, Kenneth Gibson, Gil Paterson
